      • hex2dec

        protected static int hex2dec​(byte[] arr)
        Converts a byte array representing a hex number to an integer
        Parameters:
        arr - the array to be converted, must have length <= 8
        Returns:
        the decimal value of thea array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number is too large

      • changeEndian

        Changes the endian of an integer stored in a byte buffer
        Parameters:
        buff - A byte buffer containing an integer
